name: Rogue Paragon Pre
description:
This is a very early build and not yet a demo!

Game Summary

In Rogue Paragon you play as Ohmu, an adventurer who, in his overconfidence, has lost all his money and finally his soul in a gamble of cards. A mysterious stranger offers you one last chance to recover your soul. To do this, you must get to the ultimate treasure of the Souldungeon.

Fight your way to the end of the Souldungeon by surviving a challenging, evolving sequence of levels. You'll encounter dangerous enemies and traps. Collect valuable loot, discover hidden secrets and trade with opportunistic merchants to get powerful items and the decisive advantage.

Core Mechanics

  • Primary Weapon - Your sword serves as your primary means of attack; it's fast, brutal, and can cut through almost anything.
  • Secondary Items - During your travels you will come across a variety of weapons, items, and equipment. Magic scrolls, potions and bombs are limited, use them wisely. 
  • Dash - The Dash can be used to dodge attacks, overcome crevices and chasms, break through obstacles and even stun enemies.
